sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Plus, Filter, Search, Calendar, User, Flag, Clock, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const Tasks = () => { const [tasks] = useState([ { id: 1, title: '完成用户界面设计', project: '移动端应用开发', assignee: '张三', assigneeAvatar: '张', dueDate: '2024-01-20', priority: 'high', status: '进行中', progress: 75, description: '设计移动端应用的用户界面，包括主要页面和交互流程', tags: ['UI设计', '移动端'] }, { id: 2, title: '数据库架构设计', project: '数据分析平台', assignee: '李四', assigneeAvatar: '李', dueDate: '2024-01-22', priority: 'high', status: '待开始', progress: 0, description: '设计数据分析平台的数据库架构，确保数据存储和查询效率', tags: ['数据库', '架构'] }, { id: 3, title: 'API接口开发', project: '移动端应用开发', assignee: '王五', assigneeAvatar: '王', dueDate: '2024-01-25', priority: 'medium', status: '进行中', progress: 60, description: '开发移动端应用的后端API接口，支持用户认证和数据交互', tags: ['API', '后端'] }, { id: 4, title: '前端页面开发', project: '企业官网重构', assignee: '赵六', assigneeAvatar: '赵', dueDate: '2024-01-28', priority: 'medium', status: '进行中', progress: 40, description: '开发企业官网的前端页面，实现响应式设计和交互功能', tags: ['前端', '响应式'] }, { id: 5, title: '系统测试', project: '数据分析平台', assignee: '钱七', assigneeAvatar: '钱', dueDate: '2024-01-30', priority: 'low', status: '已完成', progress: 100, description: '对数据分析平台进行全面测试，确保系统稳定性和性能', tags: ['测试', '质量保证'] } ]); const [filterStatus, setFilterStatus] = useState('all'); const [filterPriority, setFilterPriority] = useState('all'); const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState('list'); // 'list' or 'kanban' const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case '已完成': return 'status-success'; case '进行中': return 'status-info'; case '待开始': return 'status-warning'; case '暂停': return 'status-danger'; default: return 'status-info'; } }; const getPriorityColor = (priority) => { switch (priority) { case 'high': return 'text-danger'; case 'medium': return 'text-warning'; case 'low': return 'text-success'; default: return 'text-text-muted'; } }; const getPriorityIcon = (priority) => { switch (priority) { case 'high': return '🔴'; case 'medium': return '🟡'; case 'low': return '🟢'; default: return '⚪'; } }; const filteredTasks = tasks.filter(task => { if (filterStatus !== 'all' && task.status !== filterStatus) return false; if (filterPriority !== 'all' && task.priority !== filterPriority) return false; return true; }); const TaskCard = ({ task }) => (

{task.title}

{getPriorityIcon(task.priority)}

{task.description}

项目: {task.project}
{task.assignee}
{task.dueDate}
{task.tags.map((tag, index) => ( {tag} ))}
{task.status}
{/* 进度条 */}
进度 {task.progress}%
{/* 操作按钮 */}
{task.assigneeAvatar}
); return (
{/* 页面标题 */}

任务管理

管理项目任务分配与进度跟踪

{/* 筛选和搜索 */}
筛选:
{/* 任务列表 */} {viewMode === 'list' ? (
{filteredTasks.map((task) => ( ))}
) : (
{/* 待开始 */}

待开始

({filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === '待开始').length})
{filteredTasks.filter(task => task.status === '待开始').map((task) => ( ))}
{/* 进行中 */}

进行中

({filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === '进行中').length})
{filteredTasks.filter(task => task.status === '进行中').map((task) => ( ))}
{/* 已完成 */}

已完成

({filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === '已完成').length})
{filteredTasks.filter(task => task.status === '已完成').map((task) => ( ))}
)} {/* 统计信息 */}
{tasks.length}
总任务数
{tasks.filter(t => t.status === '待开始').length}
待开始
{tasks.filter(t => t.status === '进行中').length}
进行中
{tasks.filter(t => t.status === '已完成').length}
已完成
); }; export default Tasks;
